Stories Our Blog Contact Us About us Transforming Behavioral Health At Family Care Center, we practice 
differentiated care that creates a positive impact on the well-being of individuals, families and our local 
communities. Our multidisciplinary teams of empowered clinical experts deliver compassionate, collaborative, accessible care to people of all ages, across a broad range of mental health conditions. Find a Clinic About Family Care Center With over 40 locations across Arizona, Colorado, Florida, Tennessee, and Texas, Family Care Center is one of the nation's leading providers of mental health services. Each of our locations is clinician-led and offers comprehensive, evidence-based care for patients of all ages. Learn More About Our Care Leadership Team Learn More Join Our Team Learn More Blog Library Learn More News & Media Learn More Our mission Deliver the greatest positive impact on the health and well-being of local communities by delivering life-enhancing outpatient behavioral health care. Our vision To be the provider and employer of choice for multidisciplinary behavioral health care adapted from best-in-class military medicine and evidence-based practices to our communities, military, Veterans and First Responders . Our values Our core values are our guiding principles for how we serve our patients and how we work together. We believe itâ€™s not just what we do, but how we do it. Together, we prioritize: Family â€“ Collaborating to care for our patients and one another Commitment â€“ Dedication to growth and excellence Compassion â€“ Genuine concern for the health and healing of others Our history Our journey began in 2016 when two U.S. Army Veterans founded Family Care Center to care for service members, Veterans and their families. We continue that tradition today, caring for people of all ages across a broad range of conditions with over 40 outpatient clinics in communities across the country. Where behavioral health behaves differently At Family Care Center, we provide a truly integrated outpatient behavioral health model. Our clinics are structured to easily connect patients with a multidisciplinary staff that delivers evidence-based care guided by outcomes . Each of our conveniently located clinics typically includes licensed therapists, psychologists, psychiatrists, psychiatric NPs/PAs, and TMS specialists under one roof. Together, they provide comprehensive mental health care with proven positive results. Outstanding outcomes We believe every care decision should be based solely on whatâ€™s best for the patient. Itâ€™s how we deliver superior outcomes and establish new ways forward for the behavioral health care community. Our comprehensive care model uses best-in-class, evidence-based practices built upon innovations from military medicine. Through research and critical thought, we continually adapt and improve our approach. Following our comprehensive care model, over 90% of patients show positive mental health outcomes, significantly better than the national benchmark of 52%. positive mental health outcomes 0 %+ *national benchmark 52%. Learn More About Our Results Â» Community engagement Community engagement is a core part of who we are. We are dedicated to being active, compassionate members of our communities, ensuring that mental health remains a priority for everyone. By working together, we can address the broader needs of our community. We can empower individuals and families to take charge of their mental health and create a stronger, more supportive network for all. Weâ€™re proud to support: Referral partners Schools Veteransâ€™ services Employers and organizations Connect With Us Research & education At Family Care Center, we have a commitment to advancing the field of mental health through rigorous research and comprehensive education. Our in-house research team conducts and publishes research on novel treatments, patient outcomes and standards of care. We also prioritize education, offering our staff ongoing training and professional development opportunities. We have dual accreditations from the Accreditation Council for Continuing Medical Education (ACCMEÂ®) and the American Psychological Association (APA). Through these efforts, we strive to enhance our understanding of mental health, empower our providers and improve our services. Learn More About Our Research & Education The TMS Center of Excellence Our Stone Oak clinic is proud to be home to the Family Care Center TMS Center of Excellence , a national leader in advancing transcranial magnetic stimulation (TMS) and behavioral health. The Center drives clinical innovation, leads research, and sets the standard for TMS treatment across all our locations. Through these efforts, weâ€™re delivering breakthrough protocols and achieving life-changing results for patients across the country. Learn More About The TMS Center of Excellence Transformative mental health care in your neighborhood Stepping into our modern clinics, youâ€™ll immediately sense the warm and welcoming atmosphere weâ€™ve created to help you thrive throughout your mental health journey. And because each of our convenient locations accepts most insurance plans , youâ€™re getting high-quality, local care thatâ€™s affordable. Connect with a Family Care Center behavioral health provider near you , either in person or online through a virtual session . We have locations across Arizona , Colorado , Florida , Tennessee, and Texas , and appointments are available in days, not months. Find a Location Most insurance plans accepted Weâ€™re in-network with most health insurance plans and accept VA benefits, out-of-network and self-pay patients. Coverage varies by state. SKATE. PLAY! Follow View all 2 employees Report this company About us KING Family Fun Center is the ONLY place to Eat, Skate, & Play!Â®, and is headquartered in Puyallup, WA.  Only 40 mins south of Seattle and was established in Kent, WA in 1967 as Tiffanyâ€™s Skate Inn. Tiffanyâ€™s in Puyallup was built in 1969, where we have served more than 10 million guests!  In 2020, we changedOur 25,000+ sq ft entertainment and event destinations feature high-speed roller skates, our newly added KING Mini Golf Park, our amazing state of the art arcade, and our KING Cafe. For more information, please visit www.KINGFamilyFun.com.

Our King Mini Golf Park opened in August 2017, and features an amazing 18 mini golf hole experience that will surely entertain you with our winding greens and river water shots. For more information please visit www.KINGFamilyFunCenter.com .

KING Family Fun Center is an all in one complex and is the nation's premier indoor roller skating and family entertainment facility. 

At KING Family Fun Center, you can play the hottest new arcade games in our Million Dollar Midway and win tickets for epic prizes. Youâ€™ll want to play here!  Try our mouth-watering, chef-crafted creations in our KING Cafe!  From wings to pizza, weâ€™ve got whatever suits your appetite. 

Invite all your friends or coworkers for an unforgettable party or event! We work with every size and budget to make planning easy so you can focus on the FUN!  Work here!  

MISSION: To deliver an unparalleled guest experience through the best combination of food, skating, mini golf or arcade games in an ideal environment for celebrating all out fun for anythingâ€¦ for any reason!

CAREERS: Apply online - https://www.kingfamilyfuncenter.com/careers or if you are amazing and cannot wait, email us @ info@kingfamilyfuncenter.com

HISTORY: Read more about us - https://www. kingfamilyfuncenter.com/history

Family Fun Center thankful to Lakeland community for 40 years Watch Now Menu Local National Weather Sports Traffic Watch Now Watch Now Close Ã— Live Watch Alerts Search site Go Tampa Bay 28 Gives Tampa Bay 28 Listens Video Latest Video Watch Tampa Bay 28+ Tampa Bay 28 Weather 24/7 Full Circle Florida News Local News I-Team Investigations Price of Paradise Florida News National News News Links In Your Community Full Circle Florida Anchors Report Your Voice I-Team Investigations Patient No More Weather Tampa Bay 28 Weather 24/7 Radar Severe Weather Alerts Daily Forecast Hourly Forecast Maps & Forecasts Tracking the Tropics Tracking the Tropics Traffic Sports Lightning Rays Buccaneers USF The Spot - Tampa Bay 66 Lifestyle Things To Do At Home with Shay Mental Health Tampa Bay's Morning Blend Tampa Bay's Operation Honoring Heroes Florida Lottery Marketplace Don't Waste Your Money Your Health Matters WFTS Tampa Bay's Home Pros Real Estate Essentials Best of BayCare About Us What's on TV Meet the Tampa Bay 28 Team Contact Apps WFTS Sweepstakes The Spot - Tampa Bay 66 Fresh Start Advertise with Us Support Jobs at WFTS Sign In Newsletters Sign Out Manage Emails Apps Careers Search tampabaynews tampabay_28 tampabay28 UCK0UUsCjtMRNtS3BPh1Yc4w @tampabay_28 1 WX Alerts 1 Closings/Delays News Hillsborough Pinellas Polk Pasco Manatee Sarasota Hernando Citrus DeSoto Highlands Hardee More + Quick Links + News Hillsborough Pinellas Polk Pasco Manatee Sarasota Hernando Citrus DeSoto Highlands Hardee News Polk County Actions Facebook Tweet Email Family Fun Center thankful to Lakeland community for reaching 40 years Prev Next The Family Fun Center in Lakeland is celebrating 40 years of business and 40 years owned and operated by the same family. By: Robert Boyd Posted and last updated LAKELAND, Fla. â€” From mini-golf to laser tag and skee ball, the Family Fun Center in Lakeland has been making generations of families smile on special days. However, this year itâ€™s the Family Fun Center thatâ€™s blowing out the candles. They are celebrating 40 years in business. Since the Family Fun Center opened in 1981 theyâ€™ve reached some winning milestones. More than one million slices of pizza served, more than 50 million arcade games played and more than one billion tickets won. Former owner Scott Neslund said, â€œ81 happened to be the year Pac-Man came out and was a huge hit so that kind of got us started." Forty years later Scott is still playing Pac-Man, but heâ€™s no longer the owner, his son Brian has taken the controls. The Neslund family has owned and operated the Family Fun Center since its opening. â€œIt's great when somebody comes back who has been away for a while and they say, â€˜you know what I used to come here as a child and Iâ€™m so glad itâ€™s still here,â€™â€ said Brian Neslund. Brian remembers receiving his little league trophy at the Family Fun Center. Now heâ€™s here playing games with his own son and daughter. Itâ€™s a business built on generations. â€œWeâ€™ve got parents now who came here as children and had their birthdays here and now they are having their children's birthday parties here so that is very exciting to us,â€ said Brian. Brian also said itâ€™s these loyal customers who have kept the games lighting up following the pandemic. â€œTo continue a legacy and then realize this might be the end of it was a little bit gut-wrenching,â€ said Brian. â€œWe are just very grateful to the community for coming out and supporting us.â€ The Family Fun Center isnâ€™t all play. Theyâ€™ve also provided work to more than 1,500 employees over the years. â€œMany of which were first-time jobs so we really enjoyed showing people how to work their first job and teaching them some life skills over these 40 years,â€ said Brian. While some of these employees donâ€™t ever want to leave, like John Watkins. â€œStarted right out of high school, came in, worked at the counters, worked all the way up to management,â€ said Watkins. â€œMet my wife here quite a few years ago.â€ Thereâ€™s also a chance Brianâ€™s own children will help keep the business running and in the family for another 40 years. â€œTheyâ€™re ready right now, they love it,â€ said Brian. Throughout the year the Family Fun Center will be holding various promotions and special events, for more information go to Family Fun Center's website . Copyright 2021 Scripps Media, Inc. About Us â€“ DiDonato's Family Fun Center â€“ Home About Us Bowling The Alley Bar and Grille Pin Deck Ice Cream Order Takeout Holiday Train Parties & Private Events Spare Change Arcade Leagues Gift Cards Pro Shop Contact Navigation Home About Us Bowling The Alley Bar and Grille Pin Deck Ice Cream Order Takeout Holiday Train Parties & Private Events Spare Change Arcade Leagues Gift Cards Pro Shop Contact Our family and business has a rich history, just like the beautiful town of Hammonton. We are incredibly proud to be a local family owned and operated business since 1952 and are always looking forward to the growth and excitement that lay ahead. When met with the decision to renovate in 2012, we knew that this area needed something new, exciting and different. Our town was changing and growing, so we decided that we would bring a completely unique experience not just to Hammonton, but to the entire South Jersey area.Â From that desire, we broke ground on renovations in June 2012 and have been adding and growing ever since. DiDonatoâ€™s has grown from a 4-lane bowling alley back in 1952, to a true â€œone-stopâ€ family fun center with something for everyone, ages 2 to 102.Â  Our contemporarily designed facility now has a 26-lane alley and an outdoor open-air train ride to ensure hours of fun for the family. While for your dining and drinking pleasure, we have an upscale bar and grille with a frozen tap serving your favorite beers, local brews and signature drinks; a gorgeous open-air art-deco designed restaurant complete with retractable floor to ceiling windows and glass stone fireplace, and for your private entertaining needs, we have the beautifully designed 1952 Room with full private bar. We are one big family, we welcome you to visit and become a part of it! Essential Visitor Policies for a Safe and Enjoyable Experience at DiDonato Family Fun Center 2017 DiDonato's Family Fun Center

to nurture potential and mobilize local communities to effect lasting and meaningful change. Our hours are: Monday â€“ Friday 5:00 A.M â€“ 10:30 P.M. Saturday â€“ Sunday 7:00 A.M. â€“ 6:00 P.M. Directions Can I access other YMCAâ€™s with my Lakeland Hills YMCA membership? Yes. We are proud to offer our members access to YMCA facilities across the United States and Canada that participate in Nationwide Membership. This way, our members can use the Y as often as they like, making it easier to achieve their health and wellness goals. Are group exercise classes available? Yes. We have over 65 weekly classes offered from Yoga to HIT. These classes offer a great workout in a class setting, and are all included with your membership. Can I bring a friend? Yes. As a member, you are given 3 guest passes per year. You can bring a friend up to 3X for free. After that there is a fee. Guests/friends can use facility a max of 3X per year and then must become a member. Is there a trial membership to try out the Y? Yes. We have a 1-Week Trial Membership for free.Â  After that, we have several options that you can choose as a new member. What benefits do I get with my membership? Full Privilege Membership entitles you to use the pool, basketball gymnasium, Health and Fitness Training Center, general membership locker rooms, as well as group fitness, yoga, spinning classes, and all aqua exercise classes. Plus, three free guest passes per year and a fitness orientation. Some age restrictions apply. Long Term Locker Membership offers full privilege membership plus an assigned locker and towel service in an adult only locker room which includes steam room, sauna and TV. What are the pool hours? For Pool Hours and available swim times, please visit our schedules page where you can download swim times as well as gymnasium and group fitness class times. Do you offer financial assistance? Yes. We offer financial aid to ensure that no one is turned away from a Y program or service due to an inability to pay. Visit our Financial Assistance page for more information.
